thread.title: Atlanta's government works to resolve a cyber attack

title: Atlanta's government works to resolve a cyber attack
text:
Atlanta's government works to resolve a cyber attack 3:39pm BST - 01:54 
Atlanta is still struggling with the fallout from a major ransomware attack that continues to snarl the city government's computer system, nine days later. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Atlanta is still struggling with the fallout from a major ransomware attack that continues to snarl the city government's computer system, nine days later. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pXLiN5
